alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Northern Ware; Pierce (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 2:05AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN COFFEE... NORTHWESTERN PIERCE...EASTERN ATKINSON...NORTHWESTERN WARE AND SOUTHERN BACON COUNTIES THROUGH 245 AM EDT... At 205 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Pearson, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph, half inch hail, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Alma, Pearson, Nicholls, Millwood, Bickley, and Axson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
